sub_title: Communication Specialist 💬 MA of International Communication 🎓 Looking for entry-level opportunities in #Communication #Marketing # Sales💡
summary:
Welcome to my Linkedin profile! You are probably looking for someone so talented in communication, business, marketing, and sales, then, you've come to the right place! #Opentowork 

Allow me to introduce myself briefly. I am a passionate communication "traveller", I love building meaningful connections and crafting engaging messages. I am good at effective cross-cultural communication and have expertise in relationship building. I encourage myself and people to embrace variety and thrive on challenges. I am still on a journey to becoming a communication guru! 

If you're looking for someone who is filled with passion and energy, please don't hesitate to connect with me. Let's explore exciting collaboration opportunities together!

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

education.field_of_study: Teaching Chinese as a Second Language

awards.title: University Student Research Scholarship, MOST
awards.description:
A Comparison on Refusal Strategies in the Corpus of Computer-Mediated Communications and DCT data

My research project tried to compare the difference between undergraduates’ refusal strategies in social media communication and face-to-face conversation. Apparently, the popularity of social media indeed changes people’s communication.

MOST Project: https://www.most.gov.tw/folksonomy/list/2af9ad9a-1f47-450d-b5a1-2cb43de8290c?l=

2019 MCU Tourism International Conference 
-Leisure, Health, and Wellbeing- 
http://web.tourism.mcu.edu.tw/sites/default/files/u3/04-2019-%E8%AB%96%E6%96%87%E7%9B%AE%E9%8C%84.pdf

My thesis can be found on the MCU TCSL website at '2018-2019 Students Research Projects'
http://web.tcsl.mcu.edu.tw/en/content/students-research-projects

profile_positions.description: As the key contact between B&S and Alibaba, I played a crucial role in doubling the department's turnover within 8 months. I bridged diverse teams from both companies, managed projects like the API e-commerce system connection, and built relationships with stakeholders from Alibaba. I gathered business needs and created solutions, conducted research on B2B communication, and developed a comprehensive strategy to enhance effectiveness by bridging cultural gaps. I collaborated with the sales team to create culturally tailored marketing materials for the Chinese market. Additionally, I worked on my Hanze MIC graduation thesis alongside B&S, focusing on effective communication in the B&S-Alibaba collaboration. Overall, I facilitated communication, managed projects, built relationships, and contributed to the growth and success of both companies.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Intern

company.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
As a master student at Hanze University of Applied Sciences, I successfully completed various projects as part of my graduation and capstone requirements. Here's a concise overview of some key projects:

Graduation Project: Explored effective communication in international B2B context, focusing on the case study of B&S and Alibaba.

Corporate Communication Consultation, Capstone project: Provided strategic recommendations to Novo Nordisk Switzerland for enhancing their corporate communication and stakeholder engagement.

Strategic Branding Management, Capstone projects:

Developed a brand strategy for Hof van Saksen, targeting Flemish families seeking indulgence and relaxation.
Offered digital branding advice to Beerwulf for their expansion into the Italian market.
Crisis Communication, Capstone project: Created a crisis communication plan addressing road safety issues in the United States for PTV Group.

International Facilitation, Capstone project: Collaborated with PTV Group to facilitate communication and cooperation among stakeholders to improve road safety in New York City.

These projects provided me with practical experience in international communication, corporate communication, strategic branding management, crisis communication, and international facilitation.
profile_positions.title: Masters Student

company.name: Line Bank Taiwan 連線銀行

profile_positions.description:
As a Communication & Administrative OP Staff at LINE Bank, I have been part of the Customer Service and Operating Department, providing assistance to clients and guiding potential customers in understanding our financial products. Additionally, I have served as a coordinator, facilitating collaboration among various departments on multiple projects.

At LINE Bank, our mission is to develop the Internet network in Taiwan and provide users with a safe and seamless banking experience. We strive to realize our vision of "Bank In Your Hands" by offering services such as consumption, financial card transfers, and personal credit within the Taiwan Financial Account since 2021.

In this role, I have gained valuable experience and skills. Working closely with clients, I have honed my problem-solving abilities and effectively addressed their concerns. My interactions with customers have become more professional, and I have developed a stronger sense of etiquette and mannerisms. Furthermore, this position has enhanced my emotional management skills, enabling me to handle various situations with composure and empathy.

Beyond expanding my financial knowledge, this role has also allowed me to strengthen my soft skills, particularly in the realm of customer service. I have gained proficiency in communicating effectively with clients and delivering exceptional service to meet their needs.

As a Communication & Administrative OP Staff at LINE Bank, I am proud to contribute to our vision of providing innovative banking solutions.
profile_positions.title: Communication & Administrative OP Staff

profile_positions.description:
As an Account Coordinator, I managed relationships between educators and parents and students, ensuring their satisfaction through prompt and accurate service. I effectively communicated with parents, addressing their needs and concerns promptly. Additionally, I provided individualized attention to students, fostering their academic progress and well-being. Through efficient coordination and organization, I successfully managed multiple accounts, maintaining detailed records and collaborating with cross-functional teams for smooth operations and exceptional experiences for parents and students.

I maintained office efficiency through effective correspondence, scheduling, and documentation. I managed office supplies, organized meetings, and provided comprehensive support to team members. With strong organizational abilities, I handled various administrative tasks and identified opportunities for process improvement, ensuring smooth workflow and operations.

I created a positive and inclusive environment, facilitating engaging activities and ensuring camper safety. I developed and implemented programs, fostering personal growth and positive relationships. With excellent communication and conflict resolution skills, I managed camper behaviour and worked closely with parents to provide regular updates. Leading by example, I contributed to a supportive camp community and enhanced the overall camp experience.

I supported the lead teacher in classroom management and instructional activities. I provided individualized attention to foster student progress and a positive learning environment. I assisted in lesson planning, prepared materials, and effectively utilized classroom technology. With strong organizational skills, I facilitated smooth classroom activities, collaborated on innovative teaching strategies, and provided additional support to students with diverse learning needs.

profile_positions.title: Homework Coach

profile_positions.description:
Working Holiday in the USA🇺🇸
Mt. Olympus Water and Theme Park Resort is a theme park and water park resort complex in Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin. The resort is themed after Ancient Greece, particularly its mythology and gods, and is named after the mountain in Greece where those gods were said to live. Mt. Olympus features an indoor and outdoor water park and amusement park rides, and the complex includes dozens of motel buildings that were acquired by the resort in addition to its purpose-built hotel.

Responsibilities
- Perform all check-in and check-out tasks
- Manage online and phone reservations
- Inform customers about payment methods and verify their credit card data
- Register guests collecting necessary information (like contact details and exact dates of their stay)
- Welcome guests upon their arrival and assign rooms
- Provide information about our hotel, available rooms, rates and amenities
- Respond to clients’ complaints in a timely and professional manner
- Liaise with our housekeeping staff to ensure all rooms are clean, tidy and fully-furnished to accommodate guests’ needs
- Confirm group reservations and arrange personalized services for VIP customers and event attendees, like wedding guests
- Upsell additional facilities and services, when appropriate
- Maintain updated records of bookings and payments
profile_positions.title: Resort Receptionist

profile_positions.description:
The Sales Associate is the customer service specialist of the store. During this part-time job, I have learned to be responsible for exceeding customer expectations by listening to customer needs, finding products that meet their needs, and providing in-depth information about our products.

It is a great start for me to work for Uniqlo as my very first job. Since I am an individual who aspires to grow and develop into true professionals. At UNIQLO, teamwork is essential. They encourage team members to take initiative and actively participate in all aspects of our business. They also offer career advancement and salary increases to hardworking, committed individuals who consistently generate results. All of their employees, including newly hired part-time staff members, have the potential to take on greater responsibility and rise within their organization.

At UNIQLO, I believe that my work truly inspires lives. As a previous member of their team, I made good use of my energy and inspiration in this big family built toward their vision to become one of the members who also want to achieve the goal of the #1 retail apparel group in the world.
profile_positions.title: Retail Sales Associate
